message: Let's split it 50/50 to start, and we can reassess as we go along.
You're too generous, I'll take this offer!
I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share, but I'm not going to give up too much. Take it or leave it!
You're still not giving me enough. I'll take this, but don't think this is the end!
I'm getting a bit desperate, but I'm not going to give up yet. This is my best offer so far.
You're running out of time, I'm taking control. Take it or leave it!
I'm getting close to my limit. I'm not sure how much longer I can hold on.
You're almost out of time, I'm making my final move. Don't try to stall!
This is my absolute final offer. I'm not going to give you any more.
